title: John Turner, M.P.
brief_description: Work of an imaginary but typical member of Parliament for an English country constituency. At the house he welcomes constituents, discusses their problems and watches over their interests. On his constituency visits both he and his wife attend public functions; his advice and help and accessible to all, sometimes on issues affecting the whole community.
